snippet: The House passed legislation on Monday that would require public universities to charge veterans in-state tuition rates or face a financial penalty.
abstract: House passes legislation that would require public universities to charge veterans in-state tuition rates or face financial penalty.
lead_paragraph: The House passed legislation on Monday that would require public universities to charge veterans in-state tuition rates or face a financial penalty.

headline.main: Bill to Help Veterans Pay Tuition Advances
headline.print_headline: Bill to Help Veterans Pay Tuition Advances
